title: time/genzabbrs: CLDR data (windowsZones.xml) as external?
body:
by **shervinafshar**: 
Fetching `windowsZones.xml` from Unicode CLDR SVN trunk is causing bandwidth issues on
the servers. Can you please have the needed resources added as externals to your
repository rather than allowing the code the code to fetch a live file for every build?
Thanks.
